Hi Heath,

We are having an issue with one of the photos on our website.

The first screenshot is from my computer and this is how I can see it on chrome, firefox and on my mobile.

<image001.png>

The second is from another staff member when she views on firefox.

<image003.jpg>

Please could you look into this for us?

Thank you.

Warm Regards,

Abbie Gower

Managing Director of Accounting & Tax Advisory

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com>
Sent: Thursday, 19 August 2021 7:47 PM
To: Abbie Gower <agower@bellpartners.com>
Subject: Re: Bell Partners Website Login Details

Hi Abbie,

You were very close! The insights articles need to be created in the News section here:
https://www.bellpartners.com/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=news

I have copied the article across for you:
https://www.bellpartners.com/insights/get-to-know-belen-our-young-gun-winner/

Hope this helps, thanks!

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wpperk.com
